summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 6224 for the improvement of 39th Ave. North from McGilvra Street to approximately 400 feet north thereof; and certain easements; by the construction of a sanitary sewer system and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 89081, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
